channel.title: Java glitch?
channel.description:
So my server was running perfectly fine yesterday, but now when i try to run it now, i get this error:
ScapeRune Server. Original source: DeltaScape Extra Features Coded by Wise Nubcake Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2052) at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:553) at server.main(server.java:111)
How do i fix this? Because its making it to where i can't log in.' EDIT: I'm using a 317 Delta source.
